text: William P. "Bill" Robinson is an American academic administrator and communications scholar who served as the 17th President of Whitworth University in Spokane, Washington from 1993–2010. == Early life and education == Robinson was born in 1949 in Elmwood, Illinois. Robinson is a graduate of the University of Northern Iowa and Wheaton College, and earned a doctorate from the University of Pittsburgh. == Career == Robinson has also served as chairman of the Spokane Regional Chamber of Commerce. He has written two books on leadership, and distributes a monthly newsletter entitled "Of Mind & Heart". Robinson served as President of Manchester University from 1986 to 1993. In 2015, Robinson received the Senator Mark O. Hatfield Leadership Award from the Council for Christian Colleges and Universities. == References == Category:Heads of universities and colleges in the United States Category:Whitworth University Category:Wheaton College (Illinois) alumni Category:University of Northern Iowa alumni Category:University of Pittsburgh alumni
title: William P. Robinson
